definition: just as distance determines the stamina of a horse, so does time reveal a person's true heart (proverb)
pinyin: lu4 yao2 zhi1 ma3 li4 , ri4 jiu3 jian4 ren2 xin1
traditional: 路遙知馬力，日久見人心
word: 路遥知马力，日久见人心

road/CL:條|条[tiao2]/journey/route/line (bus etc)/sort/kind
distant/remote/far/far away
to know/to be aware

definition: true sentiments are seen in hard times (idiom)/you see who your true friends are when you go through tough times together/you see who your true friends are when you are in difficulties
one may know a person for a long time without understanding his true nature (idiom)
pinyin: zhi1 ren2 zhi1 mian4 bu4 zhi1 xin1

definition: the storm put strong grass to the test (idiom); fig. troubled times test a faithful minister/to show one's true colors after a stern test/also written 疾風勁草|疾风劲草
hear what he says and observe what he does (idiom, from Analects); judge a person not by his words, but by his actions
pinyin: ting1 qi2 yan2 guan1 qi2 xing2

definition: hard to fathom a person's mind (idiom)
lit. nothing is difficult on this earth, if your mind is set (idiom)
pinyin: tian1 xia4 wu2 nan2 shi4 , zhi3 pa4 you3 xin1 ren2
related.word: 天下无难事，只怕有心人

definition: those who handle cinnabar are stained red; those who work with ink are stained black (idiom)/you are the product of your environment
pinyin: jin4 zhu1 zhe3 chi4 , jin4 mo4 zhe3 hei1

definition: lit. sincerity splits open metal and metal (idiom); if you put your heart to it, you can break up metal and rocks/With a will, you can achieve anything.

definition: an outsider can see things more clearly or objectively than those involved (idiom)
pinyin: dang1 ju2 zhe3 mi2 , pang2 guan1 zhe3 qing1

definition: lit. persons who walk different paths cannot make plans together/to go separate ways (idiom)
pinyin: dao4 bu4 tong2 bu4 xiang1 wei2 mou2

definition: a gentleman's friendship, insipid as water (idiom, from Zhuangzi 莊子|庄子[Zhuang1 zi3])
pinyin: jun1 zi3 zhi1 jiao1 dan4 ru2 shui3

definition: there is nothing the determined person can't accomplish (idiom)/persistence will overcome

related.word: 世上无难事，只怕有心人

definition: Similar things group together, similar people fit together (idiom); Birds of a feather flock together.

definition: you can't judge a person by appearance, just as you can't measure the sea with a pint pot (idiom)

related.word: 人不可貌相，海水不可斗量
